TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that a  Casualty can be deleted from a crash record.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click delete icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click delete icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click delete icon.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to Click 'Yes' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to Click 'Yes' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to Click 'Yes' button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify casualty count is decremented by 1.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify casualty count is decremented by 1.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify casualty count is decremented by 1.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify casualty count is decremented by 1.
